data.eml:eml: New monotypic genera of Epipsocidae (Psocoptera: Epipsocidae) from Belize and Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article García, Alfonso N. (2009): New monotypic genera of Epipsocidae (Psocoptera: Epipsocidae) from Belize and Thailand. Zootaxa 1978: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185229
